00025 #ifndef FORMAT_H
00026 #define FORMAT_H
00027 
00028 #include <list>
00029 #include "MuleDebug.h"

00031 
00085 class CFormat
00086 {
00087       private:
00091     struct FormatSpecifier {
00092         unsigned    argIndex;   
00093         wxChar      flag;       
00094         unsigned    width;      
00095         signed      precision;  
00096         // length is not stored
00097         wxChar      type;       
00098         size_t      startPos;   
00099         size_t      endPos;     
00100         wxString    result;     
00101     };
00102 
00103 public:
00109     CFormat(const wxChar* str)  { Init(str); }
00110 
00119     CFormat(const wxString& str)    { Init(str); }
00120 
00133     template<typename _Tp> CFormat& operator%(_Tp value);
00134 
00135     // Overload hack to map all pointer types to void*
00136     template<typename _Tp> CFormat& operator%(_Tp* value)   { return this->operator%<void*>(value); }
00137 
00138     // explicit overloads to avoid pass-by-value even in debug builds.
00139     CFormat& operator%(const wxString& value)       { return this->operator%<const wxString&>(value); }
00140     CFormat& operator%(const CFormat& value)        { return this->operator%<const wxString&>(value); }
00141 
00145     wxString GetString() const;
00146     
00150     operator wxString() const       { return GetString(); };
00151      
00152 private:
00158     void    Init(const wxString& str);
00159 
00161     typedef std::list<FormatSpecifier>  FormatList;
00162 
00164     wxString GetModifiers(FormatList::const_iterator it) const;
00165 
00167     template<typename _Tp>
00168     void    ProcessArgument(FormatList::iterator it, _Tp value);
00169 
00171     FormatList  m_formats;
00172 
00174     unsigned    m_argIndex;
00175 
00177     wxString    m_formatString;
00178 };
00179 
00180 // type mappings
00181 template<> inline CFormat& CFormat::operator%(char value)       { return *this % (wxChar)value; }
00182 template<> inline CFormat& CFormat::operator%(signed char value)    { return *this % (wxChar)value; }
00183 template<> inline CFormat& CFormat::operator%(unsigned char value)  { return *this % (wxChar)value; }
00184 template<> inline CFormat& CFormat::operator%(bool value)       { return *this % (signed long long)value; }
00185 template<> inline CFormat& CFormat::operator%(signed short value)   { return *this % (signed long long)value; }
00186 template<> inline CFormat& CFormat::operator%(unsigned short value) { return *this % (unsigned long long)value; }
00187 template<> inline CFormat& CFormat::operator%(signed int value)     { return *this % (signed long long)value; }
00188 template<> inline CFormat& CFormat::operator%(unsigned int value)   { return *this % (unsigned long long)value; }
00189 template<> inline CFormat& CFormat::operator%(signed long value)    { return *this % (signed long long)value; }
00190 template<> inline CFormat& CFormat::operator%(unsigned long value)  { return *this % (unsigned long long)value; }
00191 template<> inline CFormat& CFormat::operator%(float value)      { return *this % (double)value; }
00192 template<> inline CFormat& CFormat::operator%(const wxChar* value)  { return this->operator%<const wxString&>(wxString(value)); }
